publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-435 Brian Adam: Aberdeen’s Bid to Host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011—That the Parliament offers its full support to Aberdeen’s bid to host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011 and calls on the Scottish Government and Her Majesty’s Government to do everything possible to ensure that the bid by the energy capital of Europe is successful.

S3M-435 Aberdeen’s Bid to Host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011 (lodged on 7 September 2007) Bill Kidd*, Rob Gibson*, Alasdair Allan*, Alex Neil*, Bashir Ahmad*, Liam McArthur*, Jamie Stone*, Dave Thompson*, Christine Grahame*, Bill Wilson*
S3M-435 Aberdeen’s Bid to Host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011 (lodged on 7 September 2007) Joe FitzPatrick*, Nigel Don*
S3M-435 Aberdeen’s Bid to Host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011 (lodged on 7 September 2007) Nanette Milne*, Alison McInnes*
S3M-435 Aberdeen’s Bid to Host the World Petroleum Congress in 2011 (lodged on 7 September 2007) Bob Doris*
